Description:
Detects the use of smbexec.py tool by detecting a specific service installation

Author: Omer Faruk Celik
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: smbexec.py Service Installation
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where ((provider_name = 'service control manager' and eventid = '7045') and (servicename = 'btobto' or (imagepath like '%.bat & del %' or imagepath like '%__output 2^>^&1 >%')))
